message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,350,000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective.  While I'm willing to be flexible, $1,200,000 doesn't reflect the full value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,275,000. This gives us both a good deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  However, $1,250,000 is still a bit lower than I can accept. I'm willing to come down to $1,260,000 as a final offer.  This represents a significant compromise on my part.  Let me know if you're interested in finalizing the deal at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,240,000. Can you consider this offer?
